titles.title: Boku to Sensei to Tomodachi no Mama
僕と先生と友達のママ

data.title: Boku to Sensei to Tomodachi no Mama
data.title_japanese: 僕と先生と友達のママ
data.synopsis:
Episode 1:
Our protagonist is a student who records his female teacher's behind without permission. Due to her trap, he is forced into a situation where he can’t make any excuses. Under the guise of instruction, she plans to turn this student into her playtoy. His hairless dick under her care grew and ended up turning her into the captive one.

Episode 2:
It all seemed as if it were a dream...
I went to get the DVD from my friend's house when it suddenly began raining. His mother greeted me an invited me in, saying I needed to take a bath before I caught a cold. She joined me and I was unable to help myself, she had her way with me and showed me the pleasures of a woman.

(Source: Hanime)

entry.name: Boku to Sensei to Tomodachi no Mama
